summary: Amateur retexture of all nine town guards.
descriptionHtml:
At last i ending with working on this mode. I spend many time on this and Town Guards now looks as i wanted at start. I want to thank all of you for your endorsements, downloads and i hope my mode will bring you same fun as its bring to me. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
There are two versions for use.

FINAL Version
- body armors are same as in version 1.21
- this version using diferent meshes and textures on boots and gauntlets than in original
- symbol at pauldrons is diferent as is on version 1.21
- in this version isnt packed shield retexture and gauntelts with boots from legion what Solitude soldiers using. If you want it, download it as optional files

Version 1.21
- body armors are same as in FINAL version
- symbol at pauldrons is diferent as is on final version
- this version using original meshes and types of gauntlets and boots of Stormcloaks. 
- boots and gauntlets using textures created by me
- in this version isnt packed shield retexture and gauntelts with boots from legion what Solitude soldiers using. If you want it, download it as optional files

OPTIONAL use:
If you want use my body armor versions but doesnt want to use my retexture of boots, gauntlets or helmets, than only delete what you want. All files you can find at:

Textures -    data\\textures\\armor\\stormcloaks
Meshes -    data\\meshes\\armor\\stormcloaks

By name of files you can easy know what is used for. Only boots are using same files for male and females.

----------------------------------------------
My other mods:
Light Legion Armor retexture - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3341
Heavy Legion armor retexture - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3347

----------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION
Just unpack to your Data folder in skyrim.

UNINSTALATION
- Textures are in data\\textures\\armor\\stormcloaks
- Meshes are in data\\meshes\\armor\\stormcloaks
All files there are using only stormcloaks, than delete all, or what you want.
author: Gulch
